MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:11PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:51PM on 24TH October 2020.
